name: store
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: store
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a large shop where you can buy many different types of goods

dsense.name: store
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an amount of something that is being kept for future use

example.eg: He has an impressively large store of wine in his cellar.
example.egtrans: 他的酒窖里储存了数量惊人的葡萄酒。

example.eg: Food stores are reported to be running dangerously low in the capital.
example.egtrans: 据报道，首都的食品储备量很低，形势危急。

example.eg: My grandmothers store of memories was shared over the dinner table.
example.egtrans: 晚餐时，奶奶和外婆互相谈起自己关于过去的记忆。

trans_examp.trans_en: a building in which things are kept until they are needed

name: store
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put or keep things in a special place for use in the future

example.eg: The data is stored on a hard disk and backed up on a CD.
example.egtrans: 数据储存在一个硬盘上，并用光盘做了备份。

example.eg: I stored my possessions in my mother's house while I was living in Spain.
example.egtrans: 我在西班牙居住期间，把我的东西放在我母亲那儿了。

example.eg: I've stored my thick sweaters and jackets (away) until next winter.
example.egtrans: 我把厚毛衣和外套收了起来，等到来年冬天再穿。

example.eg: Squirrels store (up) nuts for the winter.
